description:
Essential for any extended climbing trip where you might end up with burns, cuts, scrapes, rashes, cracked cuticles and heels, tissue nose, abrasions, poison ivy, and assorted gobies or flappers. This skin repair bar is chemical-free and quick absorbing, with oils and butters to get you healing faster. Proudly made in Squamish, BC, you’ll be using a little to get you back to 100% in no time.

  • Ingredients: Beeswax, shea butter, coconut oil, hemp seed oil, apricot kernel oil, olive oil, grapeseed oil, jojoba oil, vitamin E, and essential oils (cedar, rosemary, eucalyptus and lime)
  • Contains 15g
name: eM's Bars Skin Repair Bar - Rainforest Balm
